channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How China, not the U.S., became the main climate solution story in 2025
item.description: The U.S. has become a "side character" in the global story of renewable energy, experts say. China dominates the sector, with positive implications fo...

item.title: After Texas ruling, Trump and Republicans head to 2026 with a redistricting edge
item.description: Trump has prompted a redistricting race as he tries to maintain Republican control of the House in the 2026 elections. Democrats have fewer options to...

item.title: SCOTUS case could expand presidential powers. And, Dems pitch plan for ACA subsidies
item.description: The Supreme Court will hear arguments today in a case about President Trump's firing of a Federal Trade Commissioner. And, Senate Democrats are set to...

item.title: Thai Jets Bomb Cambodia as at Least 5 Die in New Wave of Fighting
item.description: Each side accused the other of firing first. The hostilities came weeks after President Trump had cast himself as a peacemaker in the decades-old bord...

item.title: Zelensky to Meet With European Leaders as Ukraine Peace Talks Drag On
item.description: Ukraine’s president was expected in London to discuss with the leaders of Britain, France and Germany ways of ending the conflict against Russia.

item.title: A Major Test of Presidential Power, and How States Make Billions From Online Casinos
item.description: Plus, the social changes sweeping Iran.

item.title: Syrians Celebrate Anniversary of Bashar al-Assad’s Fall
item.description: A year ago, rebels overthrew President Bashar al-Assad, ending decades of dictatorship and civil war. But challenges remain for the new leadership.

item.title: A Corruption Scandal in Ukraine
item.description: We examine an investigation that is testing Volodymyr Zelensky’s government.

item.title: Zelenskyy heads to London for more Ukraine peace talks. Here's what to know
item.description: The talks signal fresh support from European allies. But they follow stalled U.S. negotiations in Miami and comments from President Trump's son sugges...

item.title: Republicans push high deductible plans and health savings accounts
item.description: A Republican call to give Americans cash instead of health insurance subsidies revives an old idea that has left millions with medical debt.

item.title: Zelensky to Meet With European Leaders as Ukraine Peace Talks Drag On
item.description: Ukraine’s president was expected in London to discuss with the leaders of Britain, France and Germany ways of ending the conflict against Russia.

item.title: Marooned off the English Coast: Lots of Bananas
item.description: Containers of bananas, avocados and plantains fell off a cargo ship off the Isle of Wight. A soggy fruit harvest ensued.

item.title: Gao Zhen, Detained Chinese Artist, Keeps Creating From Prison
item.description: As Gao Zhen awaits trial in China, his wife and child live in limbo, unable to return to America, sustained by the portraits he fashions from scraps o...

item.title: Syrians Celebrate Anniversary of Bashar al-Assad’s Fall
item.description: A year ago, rebels overthrew President Bashar al-Assad, ending decades of dictatorship and civil war. But challenges remain for the new leadership.
